title: Software Development Consultant for E-Government Platform
description: The Ministry of Digital Transformation is seeking a qualified software development consultant to assist in the development of a comprehensive e-government platform. The consultant will work on modernizing government services and improving citizen access to public services.
requirements: Minimum 5 years experience in software development
Experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB
Knowledge of government systems and compliance

title: Infrastructure Development Project Manager
description: The Department of Public Works is looking for an experienced project manager to oversee the development of critical infrastructure projects including roads, bridges, and public buildings across the region.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or related field

title: Healthcare System Modernization Consultant
description: The Ministry of Health is seeking a healthcare IT consultant to modernize the national healthcare information system, improve patient data management, and enhance healthcare delivery across the country.
requirements: Knowledge of HL7 and FHIR standards

title: Agricultural Technology Innovation Specialist
description: The Agricultural Development Agency is looking for a specialist to implement innovative agricultural technologies, improve crop yields, and support sustainable farming practices across rural communities.
requirements: Master's degree in Agricultural Science or related field

title: Education Technology Platform Developer
description: The Ministry of Education is seeking a developer to create an online learning platform that will provide educational resources to students across the country, especially in remote areas.
